By GoldenBoy on Friday, January 17, 2003 - 11:00 pm:

Tecmo began to post a list of traits yesterday. thanks to all of you (and torey for making most of the additions) ours is much better than their's.

There are several more traits out there, known to charkers but unverified for a legit game. Check your book for passwords you entered, check the coaches and the foes, convince Dr Kohak to perform unholy experiments.

Whatever happens, keep an eye on your traits. Try to track how they come and go, also test your combinations several times if they are older monsters. Unusual and rare traits can pop up this way.

Things we'd love to learn about:
Merchant
Statking
Rain
Dauntless

By Thorr on Tuesday, January 28, 2003 - 02:29 pm:

Statking raises each stat by 50 when you are in Battle. It's basically a better form of Dignity.

I don't know how specifically to get it.

By GoldenBoy on Thursday, January 30, 2003 - 05:39 am:

Up Mind+
Up Water+
Up Fire+

No idea how to get them yet, just have seen them on foes.
